SEARCH
Package bcm.plugin

Class NodePlugin

java.lang.Object
fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractPlugin
bcm.plugin.NodePlugin
All Implemented Interfaces:
fr.sorbonne_u.components.PluginI, Serializable
public class NodePlugin extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractPlugin

Description

The class NodePlugin represents the plugin that allows the node component to register itself to the registry component, connect to its neighbours, execute a request, and execute a request asynchronously.

See Also:
  • Serialized Form

    Description
    NodePlugin(String registerInboundPortURI, fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.NodeInfoI nodeInfo, ArrayList<fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.SensorDataI> sensorData)
    Constructor of the NodePlugin

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addNeighbour(fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.NodeInfoI neighbour, SensorNodeP2POutboundPort p2poutboundP)
    Method to add a neighbour to the list of neighbours Thread safe method to add a neighbour to the set of neighbours it also adds the neighbour to the map of nodeInfo to P2POutboundPort
    void
    ask4Connection(fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.NodeInfoI newNeighbour)
    Method to ask for connection to a neighbour node in the case where there is already a neighbour in the same direction the method compares the distance between the new neighbour and the neighbour in the same direction if the distance between the new neighbour and the neighbour in the same direction is less than the distance between the new neighbour and the neighbour in the same direction the new neighbour is connected and the neighbour in the same direction is disconnected
    void
    ask4Disconnection(fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.NodeInfoI neighbour)
    Method to ask for disconnection to a neighbour node after disconnecting the port of the neighbour node the method finds a new neighbour in the same direction if possible by user the service findNewNeighbour from the registry component
    fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.QueryResultI
    execute(fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.RequestContinuationI request)
    Query execution service offered by the node component The method executes the query and propagates the request to the neighbours if the query is a flooding query or a directional query
    fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.QueryResultI
    execute(fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.RequestI request)
    Query execution service offered by the node component The method executes the query and propagates the request to the neighbours
    void
    executeAsync(fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.RequestContinuationI requestContinuation)
    Query asynchronous execution service offered by the node component The method executes the query and propagates the request to the neighbours if the query is a flooding query or a directional query
    void
    executeAsync(fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.RequestI request)
    Query asynchronous execution service offered by the node component The method executes the query and propagates the request to the neighbours if the query is a flooding query or a directional query

      public void addNeighbour(fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.NodeInfoI neighbour, SensorNodeP2POutboundPort p2poutboundP)
      Method to add a neighbour to the list of neighbours Thread safe method to add a neighbour to the set of neighbours it also adds the neighbour to the map of nodeInfo to P2POutboundPort
      Parameters:
      neighbour - the neighbour to add
      p2poutboundP - the outbound port of the neighbour
